concept.name: foor-loops
concept.description: for loops iterate through a set of values until the list is exhausted
concept.code: #!/bin/sh for i in 1 2 3 4 5 do echo "Looping ... number $i" done

concept.name: while-loops
concept.code: #!/bin/sh INPUT_STRING=hello while [ "$INPUT_STRING" != "bye" ] do echo "Please type something in (bye to quit)" read INPUT_STRING echo "You typed: $INPUT_STRING" done
